drinks.name: Bourbon Amaretto Sour
drinks.mixer: 1 oz sour mix, 1 oz simple syrup
drinks.instructions: Mix in shaker and strain into glass on the rocks

drinks.name: Cathy's Cosmo
drinks.mixer: 1 oz cranberry juice, 1/2 oz lime juice
drinks.instructions: Mix in shaker and strain into martini glass

drinks.name: Milan Mai Tai
drinks.liquor: 2 oz Malibu Rum, 1/2 oz amaretto liqueur
drinks.mixer: 1 oz sour mix, 2 oz pineapple juice, splash of grenadine
drinks.instructions: Mix in shaker and strain into glass
